src

Class Resources

  • java.lang.Object
    • src.Resources

  • public class Resources
extends java.lang.Object
    The Resources class uses a Singleton Design Pattern to create a shared resource between the client class (Editor) and method executor classes.

    • Method Summary

        public static Resources getSharedResources()
        Returns the one and only instantiated sharedResource.
        Returns:
        current/created shared resource

      • getCurrentImageHistory

        public java.util.Stack<ColorImage> getCurrentImageHistory()
        Retrieves the ColorImage Stack containing its history of changes.
        Returns:
        The whole history of the current image

      • setCurrentImageHistory

        public void setCurrentImageHistory(java.util.Stack<ColorImage> img)
        Sets the ColorImage Stack to the provided parameter.
        Parameters:
        img - the ColorImage Stack to replace current image with

      • getCurrentImage

        public ColorImage getCurrentImage()
        Retrieves the top ColorImage version within the current ColorImage Stack.
        Returns:
        the top ColorImage object in the current image stack

      • updateImage

        public void updateImage(ColorImage newImage)
        Adds a new ColorImage to the current ColorImage stack.
        Parameters:
        newImage - the ColorImage object after being updated from an operation/filter

      • getImageCache

        public java.util.LinkedHashMap<java.lang.String,java.util.Stack<ColorImage>> getImageCache()
        Retrieves the image cache.
        Returns:
        the image cache in its current state

      • getName

        public java.lang.String getName()
        Retrieves the name of the current loaded image
        Returns:
        the name of the current image

      • setName

        public void setName(java.lang.String newName)
        Sets the name of the current loaded image
        Parameters:
        newName - the new name to change the current name to

      • addToImageCache

        public void addToImageCache(java.lang.String name,
                            java.util.Stack<ColorImage> img)
        Adds a ColorImage Stack to the image cache.
        Parameters:
        name - key value which is also the name of the image
        img - the ColorImage Stack to add to the cache

      • getFinished

        public boolean getFinished()
        Retrieves the value of the 'finished' field.
        Returns:
        true if the application is ready to terminate, false otherwise

      • setFinished

        public void setFinished(boolean fin)
        Sets the 'finished' field with the value given in the parameter.
        Parameters:
        fin - determines whether the application should be terminated

      • getCurrentFilters

        public java.lang.String[] getCurrentFilters()
        Retrieves the list of filters that is applied to the top of the current ColorImage loaded.
        Returns:
        a list of filters currently applied to the current image

      • resetResources

        public void resetResources()
        Resets the the state of resources. This function will used for test purposes to remove independence between test cases.
